data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 5,004,400 people living in Al Minya through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Minya, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Al Minya to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Al Minya, Egypt.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Al Minya, Egypt so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Al Minya, Egypt.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Nubian, Fedicca-Mohas people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Al Minya who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Al Minya, Egypt.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Minya, Egypt has a population of 5,004,400.

We estimate Al Minya has 222,597 people who might know Jesus, 434,466 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,347,337 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Al Minya access to a Bible in their own language.
